@shekzy32 We need those at the national assembly to give us the restructuring
If the legislative members of the South East, South West, South South and North Central come together won't you be able to get that restructuring faster than waiting for a President to give you?

Is the restructuring and secession going to include restructuring the minds of the people that collect money to vote? If democracy is what the regions choose, won't they collect money from these present crops of leaders and keep the bad governance going?

Do we realise that these present set of rulers we have are from the different regions also and will be restructured alongside the restructuring and will continue from where they stopped at the central?
Is anything being done to ensure there are better leaders to take over?

While the demand for restructuring and secession is going on, what is the plan for governance? Or are we going to as usual do nothing and hope for the best?
Leadership at all level is our problem yet we refuse to do anything about it.

When Nigeria breaks into the different regions or there is restructuring how is the governance going to be? Is it monarchy, democracy, autocracy or military rule for the different regions? Who are the people that will be the leaders? The same crop we have today or different?

The South South want resources control and restructuring. The North Central equally is agitating for its own. The North East might be tired of playing 2nd fiddle to North West.
So why not get the people that will go to the legislative arm of govt & make this happen?
